app.name: Compat Title Installer
app.short_description: Install the Homebrew Channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode.
app.long_description:
Install a channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode. In its current state, it simply installs the Homebrew Channel.
Credits to:
- Dimok, smealum, others for iosuhax and Mocha CFW. - FIX94, this repo is largely based off of wuphax.
source code: https://github.com/TheLordScruffy/vwii-compat-installer
